author: Mrs sara costello
title: Mrs sara costello
text:
I was extremely happy with the service provided. The website states 1 day delivery service, so when i placed my order at 2pm on a Sunday i didn't except the Sunday to count so i was delighted when i received my parcel at 8:45 on Monday morning.
Will rrcommend lifestyle as well as using in again myselfðŸ™‚
